H0.text: By what name is Siddhartha Gautama better known. Buddha

H1.text: By what name is Siddhartha Gautama better known. Sakyamuni

H2.text: By what name is Siddhartha Gautama better known. Tathagata

H3.text: By what name is Siddhartha Gautama better known. Pháº­t

A4.text: Siddhartha Gautama, most commonly referred to as the Buddha (lit. 'the awakened one'), was a wandering ascetic and religious teacher

A5.text: In the Dhammacakkappavattana Sutta (SN 56), the Tathagata, the term Gautama uses most often to refer to himself

A6.text: The oldest surviving written records of the term Buddha are from the middle of the 3rd century BCE, when several Edicts of Ashoka mention the Buddha and Buddhism.

A7.text: Siddhartha Gautama was known as either Buddha or Sakyamuni in China, Korea, Japan, and Tibet.
